fig, ax = plt.subplots()
power_func = np.loadtxt(os.path.join(dataExtern(), 'ee4e-7.txt'), unpack=True)
l_in, Pl_in = power_func
ax.plot(l_in, l_in * (l_in + 1) * Pl_in / (2.0 * np.pi), label='Original')
for i in range(3):
    noise_map = corr_noise_gen.fromConvPower(power_func, seed=i,
        bounds_error=False, fill_value=0.0)
    ell, Pl = noise_map.powerSpectrum(l_in)
    ax.plot(ell, ell * (ell + 1) * Pl / (2.0 * np.pi), label=
        'Realization {0}'.format(i + 1), linestyle='--')
ax.set_xlabel('$l$')
ax.set_ylabel('$l(l+1)P_l/2\\pi$')
ax.legend(loc='upper right')
ax.set_yscale('log')
plt.savefig('interpolated_power.png')
plt.clf()
